creator: ajrieke@yahoo.com
text:
Filesets include do not support one of '-', '_', or '.' as part of the file 
path during FTP file transfer (I'm not sure which one) under Unix.  If you 
specify the same directory using "remotedir=" attribute, it downloads the file 
correctly, otherwise, it fails silently.

So, this is the workaround...  Specify the path using remotedir attribute.

creator: antoine@apache.org
text:
To make a download using ftp, you have to specify the remotedir attribute, 
unless you want to download from the default directory for your ftp user.

Can you explain more in details which patterns are failing for you, and reopen 
the bug report if you think there is really a problem.
